languages.text: "О, мед для моих ушей! Бальзам для отвергнутой души!" {n}Джай элегантно отбрасывает смоляные волосы с лица и озаряет вас сияющей улыбкой.{/n} "Я знала, что Бог-Император вновь сведет нас в час, когда мои услуги будут вам нужны! Я и мои таланты — в вашем полном распоряжении".

traits.locale_text: "О, мед для моих ушей! Бальзам для отвергнутой души!" {n}Джай элегантно отбрасывает смоляные волосы с лица и озаряет вас сияющей улыбкой.{/n} "Я знала, что Великий вновь сведет нас в час, когда мои услуги будут вам нужны! Я и мои таланты — в вашем полном распоряжении".

languages.text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."
languages.original_text: "О, мед для моих ушей! Бальзам для отвергнутой души!" {n}Джай элегантно отбрасывает смоляные волосы с лица и озаряет вас сияющей улыбкой.{/n} "Я знала, что Бог-Император вновь сведет нас в час, когда мои услуги будут вам нужны! Я и мои таланты — в вашем полном распоряжении".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a rejected soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the Exalted One would bring us together at the hour when you'd need my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

"Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a rejected soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the Exalted One would bring us together at the hour when you'd need my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

"Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the Exalted One would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

"Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the Exalted One would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

"Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

languages.text: 「ああ、なんて甘美な響きなの！すさんだ魂が一瞬にして癒される！」{n}ジェイは漆黒の髪を優雅にひるがえし、にっこりとした。{/n}「アンタがあたしを必要とする時に、神帝陛下がふたりを引き合わせてくださると信じてたよ！全身全霊で尽くすから、なんなりと申しつけて」
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、なんて甘美な響きなの！すさんだ魂が一瞬にして癒される！」{n}ジェイは漆黒の髪を優雅にひるがえし、にっこりとした。{/n}「アンタがあたしを必要とする時に、神帝陛下がふたりを引き合わせてくださると信じてたよ！全身全霊で尽くすから、なんなりと申しつけて」

languages.text: “噢，你这话真像蜜一样甜！给我这颗破碎的心打上了一剂强心针！”{n}婕伊优雅地向后甩了甩乌黑的秀发，露出灿烂的笑容。{/n}“我就知道，神皇将指引着我，让我在你最需要的时候出现！我与我所有的聪明才智都听候你的差遣。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: “噢，你这话真像蜜一样甜！给我这颗破碎的心打上了一剂强心针！”{n}婕伊优雅地向后甩了甩乌黑的秀发，露出灿烂的笑容。{/n}“我就知道，神皇将指引着我，让我在你最需要的时候出现！我与我所有的聪明才智都听候你的差遣。”

languages.text: « Oh, voilà qui me va droit au cœur. Mon âme éconduite avait bien besoin d'un tel baume ! {n}Jae écarte gracieusement de son visage ses cheveux d'un noir de jais et vous adresse un sourire radieux.{/n} Je savais que l'Empereur-Dieu nous réunirait lorsque vous auriez besoin de mes services ! Mes talents et moi-même sommes à votre entière disposition. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, voilà qui me va droit au cœur. Mon âme éconduite avait bien besoin d'un tel baume ! {n}Jae écarte gracieusement de son visage ses cheveux d'un noir de jais et vous adresse un sourire radieux.{/n} Je savais que l'Empereur-Dieu nous réunirait lorsque vous auriez besoin de mes services ! Mes talents et moi-même sommes à votre entière disposition. »

languages.text: «Ay, ¡esto es música para los oídos! ¡Un elixir para el alma desdeñada!». {n}Jae se aparta con gracia su pelo azabache de la cara y te dedica una sonrisa radiante.{/n} «¡Sabía que el Dios Emperador nos volvería a reunir cuando necesitara mis servicios! Mis talentos y yo están a su entera disposición».
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: «Ay, ¡esto es música para los oídos! ¡Un elixir para el alma desdeñada!». {n}Jae se aparta con gracia su pelo azabache de la cara y te dedica una sonrisa radiante.{/n} «¡Sabía que el Dios Emperador nos volvería a reunir cuando necesitara mis servicios! Mis talentos y yo están a su entera disposición».

languages.text: "Oh, das ist Musik in meinen Ohren! Ein Balsam für meine geplagte Seele." {n}Jae streicht sich elegant ihr pechschwarzes Haar aus dem Gesicht und schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich wusste der Gottimperator würde uns ausgerechnet dann zusammenführen, wenn Ihr meiner Dienste bedürft. Ich stehe Euch mit all meinen Talenten zur Verfügung."
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, das ist Musik in meinen Ohren! Ein Balsam für meine geplagte Seele." {n}Jae streicht sich elegant ihr pechschwarzes Haar aus dem Gesicht und schenkt dir ein strahlendes Lächeln.{/n} "Ich wusste der Gottimperator würde uns ausgerechnet dann zusammenführen, wenn Ihr meiner Dienste bedürft. Ich stehe Euch mit all meinen Talenten zur Verfügung."

languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

languages.text: "Ah, kulaklarım bayram etti! Dertli gönlüme deva oldun!" {n}Jae, yüzüne düşen kömür karası saçlarını zarafetle arkaya atıp sana ışıl ışıl gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hizmetlerime ihtiyacın olunca Tanrı İmparator'un ikimizi kavuşturacağını biliyordum! Tüm hünerlerimle emrine amadeyim."
languages.original_text: "Oh, honey to my ears! A balm to a spurned soul!" {n}Jae gracefully tosses her jet-black hair out of her face and gives you a beaming smile.{/n} "I knew the God-Emperor would bring us together right when you needed my services! Me and my talents are at your complete disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, kulaklarım bayram etti! Dertli gönlüme devâ oldun!" {n}Jae, yüzüne düşen kömür karası saçlarını zarafetle arkaya atıp sana ışıl ışıl gülümsüyor.{/n} "Hizmetlerime ihtiyacın olunca Tanrı İmparator'un ikimizi kavuşturacağını biliyordum! Tüm hünerlerimle emrine amadeyim."
